text: abhinawayen hata ganne shariraye yam angayaka durwalathawak, hiriwatimak ho drushtiye badhawak samanga sambandha wa nam ho
mewa lokaye yatharthayak kala wadapiliwelaya.
eeth ee kiri elakiri menma itha rasawathya.
habayi mama me nawakathawe kamathima de thamayi, kaushalya apita denne 'inikbithi siyalloma sathutin wisira giyaha' pannaye awasanayak nowena eka.
thada una, hisaradaya, as yata wedanawa, peshi ha sandhi kakkuma, same rathu paha lapa athiwima, wamanaya, aahara aruchiya, dengu unehi lakshanaya.
aluth disayin deka thunaka wadath thiyana nisa, eewath himita iwara karagena, thawa tika dawasakin aayimath parana trak ekatama watennamko hi hi..
awasanaye sidu wanne samajaya nithiya athata ganimayi.
pradhana aahara wel thunata pasu wiwidha palathuru ekkala athurupasak denna.

eeta adala rupiyal miliyana 469ka mudala madhyama rajaya wisin laba di athi bawa ohu sandahan karayi. 2006 wasare patan palathe guruwarunge hinga watup gewimata awashya mulya prathipadana sapaya athi bawa hethema kiya sitiyi.

bandaranayaka mathithumage ghathanayen pasuwa parlimenthuwe sabhanayaka wu wijayananda dahanayaka mathithuma agamathi dhurayata path wu athara ohuta ema kabinat mandalaya hasuruwa ganimata nohaki wimen asarthaka aanduwa wisuruwa hara mathiwaranayakata elambaini.
umbaa eka para liwwata mama kotas washayen kiyewwa hathara parakata .
me badala atharin morapuma penuma thibunu mama "bada mama" wuna.
mage rakiyawe swabhawaya anuwa ma hata niwasata paminimata haki wanne dawasak ara dawasak washayeni.
yasodara tharam uthum landak lokaye thawath na…
anik karuna nam ek ek nayakayange ada aramunu salaka baluwoth eya pahatha paridi we.
chandima nam umbaalata wadiya smart habayi.
mema jayath samagin tharaga 5 kin samanwitha tharagawaliya 1-1 k lesin samawi thibe.
mage thaththa kisidina mathpan, sigarat, suruttu biwwe naha.
(ape siya kiyapu widihata)
”wiwahaya gana mage paudgalika mathaya thamayi kenek wiwaha wiya yuthumayi kiyala niyamayak na.
chanal eka jathika rupawahiniya.
kalin dawase mayi, nethmiyi awilla chaliya nathara karapu thanama chaliya nathara karaddi chamika bayik eken bassa..
manaliyage muna nowa as satha paha wiya.thattu ganan ula thibu dahak jathi mada mune wenaskan aduna ganna ekath ithin sulupatu deyakya..
bohoma sthuthiyi ayiye....
samanya pudgalayekuta, sthuthi naraka madhya ha anekuth sadhaka, samanga amuththan aalaya bawata path wi thibe, tharamak eksath jathinge-wishwasi mulaya raswimak sandaha janathawa.
ee yogi loku wanchakarayek nisa.
esema aharaya pinisa wenath kisima sathwayek ghathanaya kirimata haki wanne natha.
pasuwa daruwa samanga janadhipathithuma sathutu samichiye yedi sitiya.
ema akusalaya nisa nawatha manushya lokayema minis diyaniyakwa ipida wayasa awurudu 7 di pamana adu wayasin miyayanawa.
wirahawa gana dan katha karanna akamathiyi..

siyalla ahimi wi shunyathwaye weli daragatha nohaki thana siya diwi nasa ganima thora gath wisanduma bawata pathwa thibiyadi pawa aya nawatha jiwithaya kerehi ada banda thabanne wedikawa saha ranga karyaya kerehi wana ee asimitha premaya wisini.
nirashage ammayi thaththayi athara etharamma samagiyak thibune naha.
me oona kenak upades ganne methumagen.eelangata ape kenji mathithuma saha ethumage hawulkaru samakaya wate nalin mathi thuma balanna denna ekathuwela bhashawa saha sahithyata karana meheya.
kamathiyi neda sulangata.
habayi rata wenuwen yuddha kala wiruwan dangediyata yawanna kawuru mana baluwath maithri eeta idak denne nathi bawa nam wishwasaya.
oya nadu bhanda asthanagatha wima nam mama hondata dannawa.....
panthiye mithuriyan athara ekala sitiyath owun dan natha.
mage kar eka kaduna.
thawa duratath fonseka me rate bahuthara abhilashayan wenuwen peni sitinnaku no wa fedaral haraha eelamata para kapana bhayanaka bul dosarayak bawata pathwa thibe.
oralosuwe katu kiwwe welawa hathayi kiyala.
bhithiyata path raghawage mawa saha nanandiya pujakayan dedenaku (mayilsami saha manobala) kandawagena enne niwase bhuthaya panna damimatayi.
"mata methanin yanna ida denawada poddak?"
eya hudek saka sanka gena dena karunaki.

guwane ipilena pakshihu 261.
winiwida bhawayak ekka ee hama dema ratata heli kara nam hondayi.
ape rata padanam karagena salaka baluwada ehi shiya muslim, tharika jamath (me thulada bedim rashiyak atha), thablik jamath, thawhid jamath, jamathe islam, bora muslim, jamathul muslimin…

shi්ra lankawe pa්ramukhathama apanayana agalum nishpadana samagamakawana sandalankawe omega layin samagama, rupiyal miliyana 3kata wadi wiyadamin ekama dinayaka basnahira ha wayambaa palathwala pihiti lama ha wadahiti niwasa 34ka awashyatha sapuralime ‘sahanodayata dawasak’ nam dawantha samaja sathkaraka wadasatahanak pasugiyada ki්rayathmaka keruni.
me krama sambandhawimen sagara pruthiwithala digatama athiwe.
oya wage prawina, ugath, athdakim athi palapurudu blogkaruwanwa me tharam hari asuru karanna labimath bhagyayak ayye..
mewaye inna samaharu thanapathi karyalawala hitapu riyaduro.
hamuduruwange balaporoththuwenne thamanta rakinna bari sile.
bahu - daruwo pasal yathi/yannoya.

habayi passe hitiye naha.

chanda polaka rathriya gathakirima sahena biyajanaka wyayamayak.biyajanaka kiyanne me hora hathurangenwath thrasthawadingenwath athiwena tharjana gana noweyi.hathara watema hamuda saha polis aarakshawa tharakarala thiyena nisa ee gana kisima bayak na.namuth kisima hamudawakata mella karannata bari maduru hamudawen kisima kenekuta galawimak na.wisheshayen nagarabada saha kolambaata kittuwa mewani thanwala rathriyata thiyena maduru karadaraya wachanawalin wisthara karannata amaruyi.chanda polawalwala mama ananthawath rathriya gathakarala thibbath maduru karadare nathiwa nidaganna labune ekama eka chanda polakadiyi.ee anuhathare maha chandedi rajakari karannata labunu walipanne gambada iskoleka.
ee hinda barima thana mama kiwwa hmmm..yannama oona nam yamu..habayi math enawa..kiyala.."
eheth, hama damath thathwaya ese pawathi yayi wishwasa kala nohe.
sudu reddakin aggashanu.
- mahanuwara 177 richmand widyalaya - galla 177 nalanda widyalaya - kolambaa 176 shantha aana ma.wi. - kurunagala 175 di.es.senanayaka wi.
yahapalanaya aarambhaye thibunata wada dina 100 palanayen pasu ehi adu wimak daknata labena bawath pahadiliya.
eeka ahuwamath aa mala da hondayi, hondayi machan wada tika hondata karapanko.
namuth eya kala yuthu deyak noweyi.

shri lankikayinge aarthika ha samajiya ayithiwasikam wenuwen peni sitana dushana wirodhi peramuna, merata miliyana 6 ka kamkaru prajawage samaja aarakshana aramudal aaraksha kirima sadaha sadaha bhandagara bandumkara wanchawa sambandhayen wimarshanaya kirima sadaha purna balathi janadhipathi komishan sabhawak path karana men dushana wirodhi peramuna janadhipathiwarayagen wiwrutha illimak karayi.
tharaha hithe thiyaganna ekek neweyi wage....
maha pasugami chinthanayak..
mama jathika rupawahiniye handakawim anshaye nirmanawalata dayaka wimata patan gaththe 1994 di.

kotte yugaye 6wana parakrayamabahu rajugen pasu lakdiwa ek sesath bhawaya bidi giyeya.anathuruwa udarata rajyamaye kotasak wu mathale pra deshayata yuwa rajeku washayen wijayapala kumara pathkarana ladi.mekala kanda udarata palakaya wuye ohuge piya wu senarath rajathumaya.godapala thama maligaya sada ehi sita palanaya gena giya wijayapala kumara daksha satan karuwaku wiya.pruthugisin samanga satan kara owun darunu lesa parajayata pathkirimata me kumara samath wiya.kri..wa.1635 di me kumara mathalen pala giya athara, ethan sita mathale kanda udaratata palanayata nathuwiya.1815 di mathale pra1deshaya athuluwa udarata rajyeya briithanyana palanayata nathu wiya.
kohomatath oya kala paluwangen meyatath santhosam hambawenawa athi..”
↑ barli, anthani richad (2005).

kese wethath 2010di paryeshakayin mema asthiwalin kuda kotasak wenkaragena widyagara wetha genayamata awasara labagath athara ema asthi kotasin hamuwu di.en.ee sampala ha mayitokondriya aadharayen ema asthi mita wasara 150,000kata pera mema hunugal guhawe wiwarayak thulata wati sirawi miya giya niyandarthal manawakayekuge bawa thahawuru wiya.

aparadhakaruwanta niyama wana daduwam sulu parimanaye eewa wima, deshasima athara palanaya pa්ramanawath nowima, athadanguwata ganim anupathaya awama wima saha asalwasi ratawalata sapekshawa dumkola nishpadana sandaha ayakerena baduwala wishala wenasak pawathima wani sadhaka nisa mema gataluwa merata thula idiriyedi thawaduratath wardhanaya wimata ida atha.

wathman mulkirigala bhikshu paramparawe aarambhaka himiyan wu pujya watarakgoda dhammapala swamin wahanse waliwita asarana sarana saranankara sangharajayanan wahansegen upasampadawa labagena ewaka sinhale raja wu mahanuwara kirthi shri rajasinha (kri.wa. 1747-1780) rajathumage purna anugraha ha sangharaja himipanange anushasana matha mulkirigala pudabimata wadama kara atha.
pawulo ge lekhana shailiya, patakayage sitha thula no sansindena kiyawime ruchiya awuluwalannata samath weyi.

krushikarma departhumenthuwe prakashakayek kiya sitiye ahithakara rasayanika pohora saha palibodha bhawitha kirima walakwalima sandaha aanduwa haki sama deyakma karana bawayi.mita masa kipayakata pera ahithakara se salakena krushi rasayanika thun wargayak aanayanaya kirima thahanam kala bawa krushikarma departhamenthuwe prakashakaya pawasiya.wakugadu rogayata balapana hethuwa thamath dana gannata nathi bawath katina jalaya mita hethuwak wiya haki bawa saka kerena bawath krushikarma departhamenthuwe prakashakaya wadi duratath prakasha kaleya.pathirimawakugadu rogaya mulin uthuru mada palathe pathiremin thibu athara dan dakunu palathatath wakugadu rogaya pathiri yana bawa wartha wi thibe.swarna hansa padaname pradhaniya kiya sitinne dakunu palathe ek gammanayaka wesena mulu pawul gananin adakma, wakugadu rogayata goduru wi sitina bawayi.
